p: Samples were ground in methanol:chloroform:water and extracts were evaporated to volume under a gentle stream of nitrogen before sealing and storing at -20°C [ 22]. Lipid class composition was determined through a three-step development method using thin-layer chromatography–flame ionization detection [ 23]. Lipid extracts and standards were spotted on Chromarods and the rods were developed and then scanned in an Iatroscan. Data were collected using PeakSimple software.
